basic.title: Basic Settings
basic.defaultTaskTimeDesc: Default time when no keywords match
basic.smartTimeDetectionDesc: Automatically set time based on task keywords

test.title: Keyword Detection Test
test.taskPlaceholder: Enter task description to test keyword detection...
test.multipleKeywords: Multiple keywords matched, using longest time

usage.title: Usage Instructions
usage.point1: When "Smart Time Detection" is enabled, the system will automatically identify keywords in tasks and set corresponding times
usage.point2: If a task contains multiple keywords, the longest time will be used
usage.point3: When no keywords match, the default task time will be used
usage.point4: All time settings are automatically saved to local storage
usage.point5: You can preview keyword detection effects in the test area above

ai.generationFailed: Failed to generate tasks, please try again
ai.template: Randomly generate a task pool that can be directly used for ${role} board game, and can also be generated by ${keyword}. All tasks can be completed without props. ${count} tasks in total. All time and measurement units must use Arabic numerals (e.g., 10 seconds, 1 minute). Only return the content in JSON format like ["Sweet:xx","Interactive:xx"]
